title: Whats the difference in First Strike + and Augment bundle?
body:
I know first strike gives you the skins and all that jazz, but what are Augment Caches?
Or did I miss that information somewhere?

replies.body:
also they are expensive as fuck, about $100 to get both of them, and I'm just not sure its worth it.
so do I get First Strike+ or the other one?

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oVhlEZa5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-03T09:50:29.452+0000)
>
> also they are expensive as fuck, about $100 to get both of them, and I'm just not sure its worth it.
> so do I get First Strike+ or the other one?

lul its not worth the money you get an extra gemstone in + and an extra cache in first strike. 
Augment caches they give you 1 skin and 1 random thing might be champion or 1 skin that goes into hex tech skin shards which then you have to unlock it also gives you project cores which then the next event you can change 11 cores to one of the project skins NOT the new 3 the older ones only. 
Thats all i know
I would say the project: overdrive in bundles is worth much more you get all 3 skins 3 icons and a ward skin.

Yeah I uh made that mistake, I spend 100 (Which I regret doing) meaning I now have to eat like a poor man for a few weeks.

For some clarification for those that will read this in the future.
The first Strike + bundle gives you all 3 skins + 1 gemstone.
Also gives you I think 10-15 Project boxes (Like the normal ones) But DO NOT NEED KEYS.
and they act like normal boxes apart form giving you 2 cores (Needed for the icons)

Now the Augment cache, gives you some of those IP boxes that you can buy without RP, which gives you the icons and act one again like normal boxes that don't need keys.

Do not buy it, unless you want the 10 gemstones, just spend IP instead.
It is not worth it otherwise I think.
you mean project: disruption? and yeah i bought the 10 augment cache things and got 0 gemstones im pissed

you mean project: disruption? and yeah i bought the 10 augment cache things and got 0 gemstones im pissed; and also when is this "next event" where you can change 11 project cores into an overdrive skin

Starts on the 9th and goes until the 16th, Phase 2. Disruption caches for 1500ip or 150rp and you get 7x cores, 1 overdrive blueprint, 2 Augment caches and 1 disruption icon 
With overdrive blueprint when you have 1x blue print and 11x project cores they fuse and make a Project: OVERDRIVE skin (Zed, Leona, Lucian, Yi maybe yasuo) and you can't get Katarina, Ekko and Ashe out of these.
Hope this helps you out :)
